markdown.markdown: Andy MacLachlan[^index-1] [^index-1]: The Bartlett Centre for Advanced Spatial Analysis, https://twitter.com/andymaclachlan Last updated: `r Sys.Date()` Hello and welcome to the Term 2 module Remotely Sensing Cities and Environments. Similarly, to my Term 1 MSc module, CASA0005, this website holds all the practical instructions for the module. [CASA0005 Geographic Information Systems and Science](https://andrewmaclachlan.github.io/CASA0005repo/) is a pre-requisite of the module so concepts taught there will mainly be assumed here. ## Acknowledgement {.unnumbered} Thanks to the following academics who inspired the creating of the module and various concepts within it: -
